display_long_description:
**For the best experience please update your headset to the most recent OS. If any controller connectivity issues occur please restart your headset.**

Stream hundreds of high-quality games like Halo Infinite, Forza Motorsport and Starfield on a massive 2D virtual display in Meta VR headsets with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate.  Choose from four different display sizes and either immerse yourself in an Xbox-themed virtual space or enjoy a view of your physical surroundings with Quest 3 or Pro’s stereoscopic full-color Passthrough. Skip the install and jump into your favorite games with friends right away.  With games added all the time, there’s always something new to play.*

 For more information, known issues and a list of FAQs, please see our support page (https://www.meta.com/help/quest/articles/in-vr-experiences/oculus-apps/xbox-cloud-gaming/)

*Game Pass Ultimate: Subscription continues automatically at regular monthly price unless canceled.  Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta): requires supported controller (sold separately); streaming limitations apply, server availability and wait times may vary.  Subject to xbox.com/subscriptionterms.

*Internet connection speed of 20Mbps or higher is recommended.

*Game Availability: Game titles, number, features, and availability vary over time and by region, platform, console, and Game Pass plan.  See the current game catalog at https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass/games.  Learn more about supported regions at https://www.xbox.com/regions.
